definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: The leadership of North Korea could be a poisoned chalice.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜领导层有点像一只被下毒的圣杯。

sentences.english: After this point, Grail literature divides into two classes.
sentences.chinese: 从这以后，圣杯文学作品分成了两类。

sentences.english: The blade and chalice guarding o'er Her gates.
sentences.chinese: 刀刃与圣杯守护伊门宅。

sentences.english: Like the quest for the Holy Grail, many people are on a mission to improve their abs.
sentences.chinese: 正如寻找圣杯一样，许多人都在努力改善他们的腹部。

sentences.english: Such a vaccine is the "holy grail" for flu researchers.
sentences.chinese: 这种理想的疫苗是流感研究人员心目中的“圣杯”。

sentences.english: The Holy Grail 'neath ancient Roslin waits.
sentences.chinese: 圣杯在古老的罗斯林教堂下面等待。

sentences.english: An old knight entrusted to protect the Holy Grail by King Gran.
sentences.chinese: 受格兰王之托以生命守护圣杯的老骑士。

sentences.english: Now, in my makeing of the Grail, I had torn away the props.
sentences.chinese: 现在，在我制作圣杯的过程中，我抽去了大地的支柱。

sentences.english: The origin of OK became the Holy Grail of etymology.
sentences.chinese: Ok的出典成了词源学梦寐以求的圣杯。

sentences.english: They claim the Grail legend—that of a chalice—is actually an ingeniously conceived allegory.
sentences.chinese: 郇山隐修会可不认为圣杯是个杯子。

sentences.english: Stability is the holy grail of any production environment.
sentences.chinese: 可靠性是任何生产环境的圣杯。

sentences.english: It is practically the Holy Grail of English grammar.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这本书是英语语法的圣杯。

sentences.english: Some people link Mary to the Holy Grail and the Knights Templar.
sentences.chinese: 一些人就把玛丽亚和圣杯与圣骑士连接在一起。

sentences.english: My wings beat in a frenzy, but the Grail would not move.
sentences.chinese: 我的翅膀疯狂地扑打着，圣杯却纹丝不动。

sentences.english: This is a thrilling adventure story, made up not badly. However, those journalists were more capable of spinning;
sentences.chinese: 这是一本寻找圣杯的惊险故事，故事编得倒是不差。

sentences.english: Some believe the Templars were the custodians of the fabled Holy Grail.
sentences.chinese: 还有些人相信圣殿骑士是传说中的圣杯守护者。

definition: Jeanne d'Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English/also called Jehanne Darc, the Maid or Orleans, Joan of Arc or St Joan
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
